mapper.insert: insert into u_role (role_id, role_name, `disable`, update_time, create_time, create_by, update_by) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update u_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `disable` = #{disable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, `disable`, update_time, create_time, create_by, update_by from u_role
